Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0

You create a terrifying display of elemental power. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{Dazzling Display}, except you can use this ability as a standard action and you add half your kineticist level as a bonus on your Intimidate check if youâ€™ve used gather power during the same round; doing so expends the gathered power. This ability otherwise counts as the @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{Dazzling Display} feat; feats and other effects which affect @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{Dazzling Display} (such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.kn854Ovz0BDA2Dgz]{Shatter Defenses}) apply to it, and it counts as @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{Dazzling Display} for the purpose of meeting combat feat prerequisites.
